snippet: More than 2000 leopards were poached in India in the past decade.
abstract: More than 2000 leopards were poached in India in the past decade.
lead_paragraph: “When it comes to the poaching of endangered species, elephants, tigers and rhinos tend to be in the limelight. But a new report sets out to plug the information gap on a different species that is imperiled by a tide of demand related to rising affluence in Asia: leopards,” Bettina Wassener wrote in The Green Blog.

headline.main: Leopard Poaching on the Rise, Group Warns
